FWDX9Render::MeshDX9FaceBuffer Class Reference
[External Module: FWRender]

import "fwrender.idl";

Detailed Description

Implementation class for the platform-dependent DirectX-9 IMeshFaceBuffer object.

The IMeshFaceBuffer is defined in MESH+ Module however its implementation is usually highly platform-dependentand thus it is done in External Module: FWRender. This class must be replaced or modified if any other platform is considered.

Remarks:
These objects should never be created directly, instead call IRndrGeneric::GetBuffers to get a buffer version that is fully compatible with the renderer's platform.
